name: Stegosaurus
description: The Stegosaurus is a massive dinosaur-like creature with a robust body and armor-like skin.
memorable: Known for its powerful tail capable of knocking down foes.
goals: Typically roams in search of food and safety from predators.
relations: Could be found alongside other dinosaurs or large beasts.
environment: Often found in open areas or grasslands.
strengths: High strength and constitution make it resilient in combat.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, limiting its social interactions.
attacks: A powerful tail attack dealing 17 piercing damage, capable of knocking down smaller enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Its tail can knock Large or smaller creatures prone on a failed saving throw.
additional_information: High strength score of 18 enhances melee attacks.
Relatively slow speed compared to other creatures of its size.
Notable for its large size and intimidating presence.
